text:
I have translated Apache's custom error messages in /var/www/error into 
Portuguese of Portugal. This is slightly more formal than the existing 
Portuguese of Brasil. As suggested by docs-project, I am submitting this as a 
bug report. Unfortunatelly I have no way to send files with this bug submit 
tool, so if you want the ZIP file I have of this translation, please e-mail me.

Thank you!
creator: pedro@pedrofreire.com

text:
Created attachment 19442
Translated files: includes original translations, plus Portuguese of Portugal

Oops! It turns out the second page of bug submission allows me to attach files.
You needn't email me. :-)
creator: pedro@pedrofreire.com
nick@webthing.com
text: Changing component to documentation, where it may find a portuguese speaker to review it.

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text: Moving docs bugs to docs@httpd.a.o ownership.
Thanks. Updates applied in r1043962, r1043963
creator: rbowen@apache.org
